ComicInfo.Summary:
Who was Dara's father? Who are the three powerful strangers who murdered him and the rest of Dara's family? What is the story behind the sword, and why did Dara's father sacrifice himself and his family to hide it from the three strangers?
Dara finds the answers to all of these questions in one history lesson she'll never forget.
